info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 6:07PM EDT until May 14 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
info.description:
* WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Portions of western Maryland, including the following counties, Allegany and Garrett and eastern West Virginia, including the following county, Mineral.
* WHEN...Until midnight EDT tonight.
* IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 605 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated additional heavy rainfall moving into the area and flooding in ongoing from previous rainfall. Between 2 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected tonight and this will exacerbate the flooding tonight. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Cumberland... Frostburg... Keyser... Bel Air... La Vale... Fort Ashby... Lonaconing... Ridgeley... Cresaptown... Potomac Park... Wiley Ford... Eckhart Mines... Mount Savage... Rawlings... Ellerslie... Corriganville... Midland... Midlothian... Woodland... Spring Gap... - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING

area.areaDesc: Allegany, MD; Garrett, MD; Mineral, WV
